detail_desc: 5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. The cotton content of the shorts is partly recycled.
Utility shirt in cotton twill with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Top in an airy weave with embroidery, an opening with a button at the back of the neck and short sleeves. Jersey lining.
Classic T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a slightly higher waist, ties at one side and wider sides.
Hipster briefs in lace with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
5-pocket denim jeans with a regular waist, zip fly and button and slim legs. Made using Lycra® Freefit® technology for soft, super-generous stretch, maximum mobility and optimal comfort.
Long-sleeved top in airy Tencel™ lyocell jersey with a round neck and rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Wide tunic in an airy cotton weave with a small stand-up collar, opening at the front and narrow ties at the top. Dropped shoulders, long wide sleeves with narrow buttoned cuffs, and a gathered seam at the hips for added width. Lined in a viscose weave.
Cropped top in jersey crêpe with a deep V-neck, drawstring down the front for a draped effect and short, wide sleeves.

Sleeveless dress in a patterned crêpe weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck and elastication and a flounce around the neckline. Elasticated seam with a decorative bow at the waist. Unlined.
Straight-cut top in satin with smocking at the top and narrow, tie-top shoulder straps.
Cardigan in a soft, inside-out jacquard knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. No buttons.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with taped details and short raglan sleeves. Rounded and longer at the back.

Hoodie in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a lined, drawstring hood, dropped shoulders and long balloon sleeves. Wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The polyester content of the hoodie is recycled.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. High waist with wide elastication and a drawstring, and side pockets. The polyester content of the shorts is recycled.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Calf-length dress in viscose crêpe weave with a V-neck, wrapover front with ties at the waist and a concealed press-stud at the neckline and waist. Long sleeves with an opening and button at the cuffs. Lined skirt.
Scarf in a soft cashmere weave with fringes along the short sides.
5-pocket skinny-fit trousers in superstretch twill with embroidery, hard-worn details and a zip fly and button. Cut-off, raw-edge hems.

V-neck blouse in a soft viscose weave with inset lace trims at the shoulders and on the sleeves. Elasticated seam under the bust with detachable ties and 3/4-length sleeves with narrow elastication and a frill trim with an overlocked edge at the cuffs.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Wide, textured-knit jumper in a soft alpaca blend with a V-neck, dropped shoulders and wide sleeves with a contrasting colour edge at the cuffs.
Cardigan in a soft, fine knit with long sleeves and patch front pockets. No buttons.
Jacket in soft fleece with a hood and ear appliques. Zip down the front in a contrasting colour, front pockets, and an elasticated hem with a small embroidered motif above one side.
Dress in soft, organic cotton jersey with flutter sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist with decorative gathers.
Fine-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Long T-shirt in jersey with sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves.

Set with a short-sleeved cotton shirt, a pair of trousers and a waistcoat woven in a linen blend and a matching bow tie. Shirt with a collar, buttons down the front and sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves. Trousers with an adjustable elasticated waist, fake fly and button, and fake front and back pockets. Waistcoat with buttons at the front. Pre-tied bow tie with an adjustable elastic strap and plastic fastener at the back of the neck.
Wide, ankle-length trousers in pleated jersey with a sheen. Elasticated waist and raw-edge hems.
Straight-cut blouse in an airy cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Short cap sleeves with gathers at the shoulders and scalloped trims, buttons at the back and a scalloped hem.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend containing some wool with a stand-up collar, decorative buttons on one shoulder and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Strapless playsuit in a viscose weave with elastication and a narrow frill trim at the top. Elasticated seam at the waist and short legs.
Knee-length dress in a fine rib knit with a V-neck, long sleeves and a slit in one side.
Small football in printed imitation leather. Diameter approx. 14 cm.

Short dress in a viscose crêpe weave. Opening at the back with a button at the back of the neck and long puff sleeves with wide smocking and a small frill trim at the cuffs. Gathered seam under the bust with concealed, covered elastication at the back. Unlined.
Ankle boots in imitation leather with block heels, elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and chunky soles. Heel 7 cm.
Wide jumper in a soft, chunky jacquard knit with a ribbed polo neck, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs, and a ribbed, rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Tunic in a soft viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with two buttons at the cuffs, and a rounded hem with slits in the sides.

Quilted jacket for a dog in woven fabric with a collar and opening for a leash at the back of the neck. Opening for the front legs and an adjustable hook and loop tab that fastens at the top. Narrow elastic straps for the back legs that help to keep the jacket in place. Lined.

Set with a short-sleeved bodysuit and pair of shorts in an organic cotton blend. Jersey bodysuit with a sewn-on waistcoat and bow tie in woven fabric, sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves and press-studs at the shoulders and crotch. Shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated waist and fake fly.
Blouse in woven fabric with a round neck and collar with ties at the front. Gathered yoke at the back, buttons down the front, long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Loafers with a decorative seam at the front. Canvas linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 1.5 cm.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a kangaroo pocket, jersey-lined hood with a wrapover front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Calf-length, A-line dress in jersey crêpe with pleats front and back. Round neck with an opening at the top that fastens with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, long raglan sleeves and concealed pockets in the side seams.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, pockets in the side seams and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Straight-cut top in jacquard-weave viscose with satin stripes. V-neck front and back, ties at the back of the neck and wide shoulder straps. Unlined.
Poncho in an airy weave with pompom trims at the sides.
Suit waistcoat in a cotton weave with buttons down the front, front pockets and a welt chest pocket. Lined.
Short, fine-knit socks designed to be hidden by your shoes with a silicone trim at the back of the heel to keep them in place.
A-line, round-necked dress in viscose crêpe with an opening and concealed button at the back of the neck, long sleeves with a seam and flounce at the top and elasticated cuffs. Unlined.

Longer-style hoodie in sweatshirt fabric with a soft brushed inside. Jersey-lined hood, a small, embroidered detail on the front, dropped shoulders, long sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The cotton content of the hoodie is organic.

Lace body with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, hook-and-eye fastening at the back and lined gusset with concealed press-studs.
Knee-length, printed swim shorts with elastication and ties at the waist and a fly with a hook and loop fastening. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Lined triangle bikini top with wide, adjustable shoulder straps and padded cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Metal fastening at the back.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric. Lined front with removable inserts, a racer back and a wide elastic hem. Extra firm support.
Coat in soft wool containing some cashmere with notch lapels, buttons down the front, jetted side pockets, a detachable tie belt at the waist and slits in the sides. Unlined.
Wide, calf-length skirt in an airy cotton weave with a high waist and concealed zip in one side. Unlined.
Ankle-length twill trousers in a wool blend with a high waist, zip fly and concealed button. Side pockets, decorative back pockets and tapered legs with decorative seams and slits at the hems.

Lace push-up bra with a decorative elastic trim and underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Cap in woven fabric with a contrasting colour peak, appliqué on the front and adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Round metal earrings with fabric tassels. Length 9 cm.
Vest top in soft viscose jersey with inset lace sections and a rounded hem.
Boxer shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated waist, long legs and button fly.

Jumper in soft, rib-knit cotton with a round neckline, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the cuffs and hem. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.
Mittens in a soft, fine knit with ribbed cuffs.
Short, A-line dress in denim with a frill-trimmed collar and short puff sleeves with cuffs and a press-stud. Small opening at the back with a button at the back of the neck. Unlined.
Short, V-neck dress in stretch jersey with a wrapover front with ties at one side, and long sleeves.
Short dress in sequined mesh with a concealed zip at the back, shoulder pads and long sleeves with a concealed zip at the cuffs. Jersey lining.
Sleeveless top in soft jersey containing some linen with a small, pleated frill trim around the armholes and gathers in the sides for best fit.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, side pockets, welt back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly.
Wide top in soft jersey with a print motif on the front and short dolman sleeves. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Chinos in an airy cotton weave with a zip fly, side pockets, welt back pockets and tapered legs.
Sleeveless playsuit in patterned cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and decorative gathers at the neckline. Elasticated seam and bow at the waist and rounded, gathered side pockets.
V-neck T-shirt in cotton jersey with hard-worn details.
Straight T-shirt in sturdy cotton jersey.
Round sunglasses with narrow metal frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Blouse in double-weave organic cotton with a gently gathered yoke, buttons down the front and long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs.
